member.name: PathGradientBrush.GetBlend
member.summary: The PathGradientBrush.GetBlend method gets the blend factors and the corresponding blend positions currently set for this path gradient brush.
member.param: Pointer to an array that receives the blend factors.
Pointer to an array that receives the blend positions.

Integer that specifies the number of blend factors to retrieve. Before calling the PathGradientBrush.GetBlend method of aPathGradientBrush object, call the method of that samePathGradientBrush object to determine the current number of blend factors. The number of blend positions retrieved is the same as the number of blend factors retrieved.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: PathGradientBrush.GetBlendCount
member.summary: The PathGradientBrush.GetBlendCount method gets the number of blend factors currently set for this path gradient brush.
member.returns: This method returns the number of blend factors currently set for this path gradient brush.

member.name: PathGradientBrush.GetCenterColor
member.summary: The PathGradientBrush.GetCenterColor method gets the color of the center point of this path gradient brush.
member.param: Pointer to a Color object that receives the color of the center point.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: PathGradientBrush.GetCenterPoint
member.summary: The PathGradientBrush.GetCenterPoint method gets the center point of this path gradient brush.
member.param: Pointer to aPoint object that receives the center point.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: PathGradientBrush.GetCenterPoint
member.summary: The PathGradientBrush.GetCenterPoint method gets the center point of this path gradient brush.
member.param: Pointer to a PointF object that receives the center point.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: PathGradientBrush.GetFocusScales
member.summary: The PathGradientBrush.GetFocusScales method gets the focus scales of this path gradient brush.
member.param: Pointer to aREAL that receives the x focus scale value.
Pointer to aREAL that receives the y focus scale value.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: PathGradientBrush.GetGammaCorrection
member.summary: The PathGradientBrush.GetGammaCorrection method determines whether gamma correction is enabled for this path gradient brush.
member.returns: If gamma correction is enabled, this method returns TRUE; otherwise, it returns FALSE.

member.name: PathGradientBrush.GetGraphicsPath
member.summary: The PathGradientBrush.GetGraphicsPath method is not implemented in Windows GDI+ version 1.0.

member.name: PathGradientBrush.GetInterpolationColorCount
member.summary: The PathGradientBrush.GetInterpolationColorCount method gets the number of preset colors currently specified for this path gradient brush.
member.returns: This method returns the number of preset colors currently specified for this path gradient brush.

member.name: PathGradientBrush.GetInterpolationColors
member.summary: The PathGradientBrush.GetInterpolationColors method gets the preset colors and blend positions currently specified for this path gradient brush.
member.param: Pointer to an array that receives the preset colors. A color of a given index in thepresetColors array corresponds to the blend position of that same index in theblendPositions array.

Pointer to an array that receives the blend positions. Each blend position is a number from 0 through 1, where 0 indicates the boundary of the gradient and 1 indicates the center point. A blend position between 0 and 1 indicates the set of all points that are a certain fraction of the distance from the boundary to the center point. For example, a blend position of 0.7 indicates the set of all points that are 70 percent of the way from the boundary to the center point.
Integer that specifies the number of elements in thepresetColors array. This is the same as the number of elements in theblendPositions array.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: PathGradientBrush.GetPointCount
member.summary: The PathGradientBrush.GetPointCount method gets the number of points in the array of points that defines this brush's boundary path.
member.returns: This method returns the number of points in the array of points that defines this brush's boundary path.

member.name: PathGradientBrush.GetRectangle
member.summary: The PathGradientBrush.GetRectangle method gets the smallest rectangle that encloses the boundary path of this path gradient brush.
member.param: Pointer to a Rect object that receives the bounding rectangle.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: PathGradientBrush.GetRectangle
member.summary: The PathGradientBrush.GetRectangle method gets the smallest rectangle that encloses the boundary path of this path gradient brush.
member.param: Pointer to a RectF object that receives the bounding rectangle.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: PathGradientBrush.GetSurroundColorCount
member.summary: The PathGradientBrush.GetSurroundColorCount method gets the number of colors that have been specified for the boundary path of this path gradient brush.
member.returns: This method returns the number of colors that have been specified for the boundary path of this path gradient brush.

member.name: PathGradientBrush.GetSurroundColors
member.summary: The PathGradientBrush.GetSurroundColors method gets the surround colors currently specified for this path gradient brush.
member.param: Pointer to an array that receives the surround colors.

Pointer to an integer that, on input, specifies the number of colors requested. If the method succeeds, this parameter, on output, receives the number of colors retrieved. If the method fails, this parameter does not receive a value.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: PathGradientBrush.GetTransform
member.summary: The PathGradientBrush.GetTransform method gets transformation matrix of this path gradient brush.
member.param: Pointer to a Matrix object that receives the transformation matrix.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: PathGradientBrush.GetWrapMode
member.summary: The PathGradientBrush.GetWrapMode method gets the wrap mode currently set for this path gradient brush.
member.returns: This method returns an element of the enumeration that indicates the wrap mode currently set for this path gradient brush.

member.name: PathGradientBrush.MultiplyTransform
member.summary: The PathGradientBrush.MultiplyTransform method updates the brush's transformation matrix with the product of itself and another matrix.
member.param: Pointer to the matrix that will be multiplied by the brush's current transformation matrix.

Optional. Element of the enumeration that specifies the order of the multiplication. specifies that the passed matrix is on the left, and specifies that the passed matrix is on the right. The default value is .

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: PathGradientBrush.PathGradientBrush
member.summary: Creates a PathGradientBrush.PathGradientBrush object based on a GraphicsPath object.
member.param: Pointer to a GraphicsPath object that specifies the boundary path of the path gradient brush.

member.name: PathGradientBrush.PathGradientBrush
member.summary: Creates a PathGradientBrush object based on an array of points. Initializes the wrap mode of the path gradient brush.
member.param: Pointer to an array of points that specifies the boundary path of the path gradient brush.
Integer that specifies the number of elements in the points array.
Optional. Element of the enumeration that specifies how areas painted with the path gradient brush will be tiled. The default value is WrapModeClamp.

member.name: PathGradientBrush.PathGradientBrush
member.summary: Creates a PathGradientBrush.PathGradientBrush object based on an array of points. Initializes the wrap mode of the path gradient brush.
member.param: Pointer to an array of points that specifies the boundary path of the path gradient brush.
Integer that specifies the number of elements in the points array.
Optional. Element of the enumeration that specifies how areas painted with the path gradient brush will be tiled. The default value is WrapModeClamp.

member.name: PathGradientBrush.ResetTransform
member.summary: The PathGradientBrush.ResetTransform method resets the transformation matrix of this path gradient brush to the identity matrix. This means that no transformation will take place.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: PathGradientBrush.RotateTransform
member.summary: The PathGradientBrush.RotateTransform method updates this brush's current transformation matrix with the product of itself and a rotation matrix.
member.param: Real number that specifies the angle of rotation in degrees.

Optional. Element of the enumeration that specifies the order of the multiplication. specifies that the rotation matrix is on the left, and specifies that the rotation matrix is on the right. The default value is .

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: PathGradientBrush.ScaleTransform
member.summary: The PathGradientBrush.ScaleTransform method updates this brush's current transformation matrix with the product of itself and a scaling matrix.
member.param: Real number that specifies the horizontal scale factor.
Real number that specifies the vertical scale factor.

Optional. Element of the enumeration that specifies the order of the multiplication. specifies that the scaling matrix is on the left, and specifies that the scaling matrix is on the right. The default value is .

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: PathGradientBrush.SetBlend
member.summary: The PathGradientBrush.SetBlend method sets the blend factors and the blend positions of this path gradient brush.
member.param: Pointer to an array of blend factors. Each number in the array should be in the range 0 through 1.
Pointer to an array of blend positions. Each number in the array should be in the range 0 through 1.
Integer that specifies the number of elements in theblendFactors array. This is the same as the number of elements in theblendPositions array.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: PathGradientBrush.SetBlendBellShape
member.summary: The PathGradientBrush.SetBlendBellShape method sets the blend shape of this path gradient brush.
member.param: Real number that specifies where the center color will be at its highest intensity. This number must be in the range 0 through 1.
Optional. Real number that specifies the maximum intensity of center color that gets blended with the boundary color. This number must be in the range 0 through 1. The default value is 1.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: PathGradientBrush.SetBlendTriangularShape
member.summary: The PathGradientBrush.SetBlendTriangularShape method sets the blend shape of this path gradient brush.
member.param: Real number that specifies where the center color will be at its highest intensity. This number must be in the range 0 through 1.
Optional. Real number that specifies the maximum intensity of center color that gets blended with the boundary color. This number must be in the range 0 through 1. The default value is 1.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: PathGradientBrush.SetCenterColor
member.summary: The PathGradientBrush.SetCenterColor method sets the center color of this path gradient brush. The center color is the color that appears at the brush's center point.
member.param: Reference to a Color object that specifies the center color.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: PathGradientBrush.SetCenterPoint
member.summary: The PathGradientBrush.SetCenterPoint method sets the center point of this path gradient brush. By default, the center point is at the centroid of the brush's boundary path, but you can set the center point to any location inside or outside the path.
member.param: Reference to a PointF object that specifies the center point.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: PathGradientBrush.SetCenterPoint
member.summary: The PathGradientBrush.SetCenterPoint method sets the center point of this path gradient brush. By default, the center point is at the centroid of the brush's boundary path, but you can set the center point to any location inside or outside the path.
member.param: Reference to aPoint object that specifies the center point.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: PathGradientBrush.SetFocusScales
member.summary: The PathGradientBrush.SetFocusScales method sets the focus scales of this path gradient brush.
member.param: Real number that specifies the x focus scale.
Real number that specifies the y focus scale.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: PathGradientBrush.SetGammaCorrection
member.summary: The PathGradientBrush.SetGammaCorrection method specifies whether gamma correction is enabled for this path gradient brush.
member.param: Boolean value that specifies whether gamma correction is enabled. TRUE specifies that gamma correction is enabled, and FALSE specifies that gamma correction is not enabled.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: PathGradientBrush.SetGraphicsPath
member.summary: The PathGradientBrush.SetGraphicsPath method is not implemented in Windows GDI+ version 1.0.

member.name: PathGradientBrush.SetInterpolationColors
member.summary: The PathGradientBrush.SetInterpolationColors method sets the preset colors and the blend positions of this path gradient brush.
member.param: Pointer to an array of Color objects that specifies the interpolation colors for the gradient. A color of a given index in thepresetColors array corresponds to the blend position of that same index in theblendPositions array.

Pointer to an array that specifies the blend positions. Each blend position is a number from 0 through 1, where 0 indicates the boundary of the gradient and 1 indicates the center point. A blend position between 0 and 1 specifies the set of all points that are a certain fraction of the distance from the boundary to the center point. For example, a blend position of 0.7 specifies the set of all points that are 70 percent of the way from the boundary to the center point.
Integer that specifies the number of Color objects in thepresetColors array. This is the same as the number of elements in theblendPositions array.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: PathGradientBrush.SetSurroundColors
member.summary: The PathGradientBrush.SetSurroundColors method sets the surround colors of this path gradient brush. The surround colors are colors specified for discrete points on the brush's boundary path.
member.param: Pointer to an array of Color objects that specify the surround colors.

Pointer to an integer that, on input, specifies the number of Color objects in thecolors array. If the method succeeds, this parameter, on output, receives the number of surround colors set. If the method fails, this parameter does not receive a value.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: PathGradientBrush.SetTransform
member.summary: The PathGradientBrush.SetTransform method sets the transformation matrix of this path gradient brush.
member.param: Pointer to aMatrix object that specifies the transformation matrix.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: PathGradientBrush.SetWrapMode
member.summary: The PathGradientBrush.SetWrapMode method sets the wrap mode of this path gradient brush.
member.param: Element of the enumeration that specifies how areas painted with the path gradient brush will be tiled. The default value is .

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: PathGradientBrush.TranslateTransform
member.summary: The PathGradientBrush.TranslateTransform method updates this brush's current transformation matrix with the product of itself and a translation matrix.
member.param: Real number that specifies the horizontal component of the translation.
Real number that specifies the vertical component of the translation.

Optional. Element of the enumeration that specifies the order of the multiplication. specifies that the translation matrix is on the left, and specifies that the translation matrix is on the right. The default value is .

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.
